content.description: The following question refers to the topic of new political theories and monarchies in the Renaissance.
content.question: Which of the following features of Renaissance Italy had the most influence on the development of new political theories there?

choices.label: The threat of Ottoman expansion into Italy
The division of Italy into numerous city-states
The predominance of Catholicism in Italy
The use of several closely related dialects in Italy

content.answer: The division of Italy into numerous city-states

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
